entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to 7 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
